how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Task and project management (including CRMs);As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, my TiddlyWiki is for personal use only
putting it all together, what value does: My notes, ideas an tasks are all in the same place. All is available on all my platforms (different laptops). I can control it myself.
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...)
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki through web browser with Download Saver (default saving mechanism)
how do you back up/sync changes between: Consumer online storage (e.g. Google Drive, Dropbox)
